abilities.description: The user can remove a person's heart while keeping them alive, giving the user leverage over the victim.
abilities.limitations: The victim remains alive and conscious even without their heart, but they are vulnerable to the user's control.

abilities.description: The user can swap the hearts or personalities of two people, putting their minds in each other's bodies.
abilities.limitations: The switched individuals must adapt to their new bodies and physical capabilities.

keyMoments.title: Smoker's Heart Removed
keyMoments.description: Law uses the Ope Ope no Mi to remove Vice Admiral Smoker's heart, defeating him.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Law's mastery and the combat applications of his Devil Fruit.

keyMoments.title: Smoker and Tashigi Heart Switch
keyMoments.description: Law swaps the hearts/personalities of Smoker and Tashigi, putting their minds in each other's bodies.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals a new application of the Ope Ope no Mi's powers, showing its versatility beyond surgical precision.

strengths: Allows user to perform surgical operations from a distance
Can remove and manipulate organs including hearts
Creates a spatial 'ROOM' for complete control
weaknesses: Standard Devil Fruit weaknesses (sea water, Seastone)
Limited by the size and duration of the ROOM

abilities.description: The user can create clothing and garments by placing leaves or stones on someone's head and transforming them through visualization.
abilities.limitations: The created clothing reverts back to its original form (leaves or stones) when removed from the wearer.

keyMoments.title: Creates Warm Clothing for Children
keyMoments.description: Kin'emon demonstrates his Devil Fruit ability by creating warm clothing for the freezing children on Punk Hazard.
keyMoments.significance: First clear demonstration of the Fuku Fuku no Mi in the anime, showing its practical utility for protection and survival.

strengths: Can create any type of clothing through visualization
Useful for disguises and environmental protection
weaknesses: Standard Devil Fruit weaknesses (sea water, Seastone)
Clothing is temporary and reverts when removed
Requires leaves or stones as base material
